name: epsibot
description: Light discord bot for epsilon needs

scripts.start: npm run build && clear && npm run start:builded
scripts.build: npm run check && npm run build:unsafe && echo 'Build finished'
scripts.register: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps -r dotenv/config built/script/register-commands.js
scripts.migrate: npm run build:unsafe && npm run typeorm migration:run
scripts.migrate:show: npm run build:unsafe && npm run typeorm migration:show
scripts.generate: npm run build:unsafe && npm run typeorm migration:generate -p true src/database/migration/todo && npm run prettier
scripts.synclog: npm run build:unsafe && npm run typeorm schema:log
scripts.test: echo 'Sorry, there is no tests for now'

author: EpsiTeam
